title: 80 Million *2011* [DVDRip][XviD][AC3][PL+English subs]
description:
Based on true events, movie about the Power of Thousands, the Courage of Hundreds and the Friendship and smart of a Few - thanks to whom a change of Fate of Millions became possible...
Polish "Solidarity" activists prepare a bravura heist, taking out 80 mln from a union bank account - just before it is blocked by communists authorities. The film was selected as the Polish entry for the "Best Foreign Language Oscar" at the 85th Academy Awards.

Title: 80 milionÃ³w (80 Million also: 80 Millions)
Production: Poland / year: 2011 / type: Movie
Genres: drama / action / history / non-fiction
Language: Polish / +English subtitles (SRT)

The action takes place in the southern-Poland City of Wroclaw, in December 1981 - just before imposition of Martial Law in Poland by the communist regime, and the Polish authorities are clamping down on the union activists. Also they plan to freeze the funds of "Solidarity" in order to cripple a growing opposition movement. Then, the five ordinary union workers come up with a daring scheme... 
Wladyslaw Frasyniuk - then-leader of the regional "Solidarity" - along with four colleagues, withdrew 80 million of the organization's money out of the bank. It's a risky business - this action must by kept in secret, and they have no special skills or training, they all are still watched by the Secret Police - and they don't know: who they can trust... There is no way to pull off the "theft" without their identities being revealed. They'll then have to successfully hide the money and keep their enemies from tracking it down...
This money was later used to build the underground resistance movement against communism. Based on true events.
